eu.mondo.mondix.core

Interface IMondixInstance

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IChangeAwareMondixInstance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ChangeAwareMondixInstance, MondixInstance

    public interface IMondixInstance
    A Mondix indexer that publishes a number of base relations (IMondixRelation).

    A catalog relation is also published for reflectively querying the set of published relations.

    Author:
    Bergmann Gabor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IMondixRelation getBaseRelationByName(java.lang.String relationName)
      Retrieves the mondix base relation of the specified name.
      IMondixRelation getCatalogRelation()
      Returns the catalog relation that lists all relations published by this mondix instance.
      IUnaryQueryInstance getPublishedRelationNames()
      Returns a query into the catalog relation that lists the names of all relations published by this mondix instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getBaseRelationByName

        IMondixRelation getBaseRelationByName(java.lang.String relationName)
        Retrieves the mondix base relation of the specified name.
        Parameters:
        relationName - the name of the relation to return
        Returns:
        the single relation whose name is the given string, or null if none exists

      • getCatalogRelation

        IMondixRelation getCatalogRelation()
        Returns the catalog relation that lists all relations published by this mondix instance.

        The catalog relation is guaranteed to:

        • contain a column called "name" that indicates the names of each published relation (including the catalog itself)
        • have the empty string as name

        Equivalent to calling getBaseRelationByName(String) with an empty string parameter

      • getPublishedRelationNames

        IUnaryQueryInstance getPublishedRelationNames()
        Returns a query into the catalog relation that lists the names of all relations published by this mondix instance.

        Equivalent to calling getCatalogRelation() and opening a query instance that selects the column "name" only.
